1: הֹד֣וּ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>O give thanks</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>for [he is] good</n> כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[endureth] for ever</n> חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>for his mercy</n>
2: יֹ֭אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> גְּאוּלֵ֣י <sup>1350 </sup> <n>Let the redeemed</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Whom</n> גְּ֝אָלָ֗ם <sup>1350 </sup> <n>[so] whom he hath redeemed</n> מִיַּד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>from the hand</n> צָֽר׃ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>of the enemy</n>
3: וּֽמֵאֲרָצ֗וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>them out of the lands</n> קִ֫בְּצָ֥ם <sup>6908 </sup> <n>And gathered</n> מִמִּזְרָ֥ח <sup>4217 </sup> <n>from the east</n> וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <sup>4628 </sup> <n>and from the west</n> מִצָּפ֥וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>from the north</n> וּמִיָּֽם׃ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>and from the south</n>
4: תָּע֣וּ <sup>8582 </sup> <n>They wandered</n> בַ֭מִּדְבָּר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> בִּישִׁימ֣וֹן <sup>3452 </sup> <n>in a solitary</n> דָּ֑רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> עִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>no city</n> מ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב <sup>4186 </sup> <n>to dwell</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> מָצָֽאוּ׃ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>they found</n>
5: רְעֵבִ֥ים <sup>7457 </sup> <n>Hungry</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>again</n> צְמֵאִ֑ים <sup>6771 </sup> <n>and thirsty</n> נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>their soul</n> בָּהֶ֥ם תִּתְעַטָּֽף׃ <sup>5848 </sup> <n>fainted</n>
6: וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <sup>6817 </sup> <n>Then they cried</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> בַּצַּ֣ר <sup>6862 </sup> <n>in their trouble</n> לָהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>out</n> מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>4691 </sup> <n>them out of their distresses</n> יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>[and] he delivered</n>
7: וַ֭יַּֽדְרִיכֵם <sup>1869 </sup> <n>And he led them forth</n> בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>way</n> יְשָׁרָ֑ה <sup>3477 </sup> <n>by the right</n> לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>to go</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>to a city</n> מוֹשָֽׁב׃ <sup>4186 </sup> <n>of habitation</n>
8: יוֹד֣וּ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>Oh that [men] would praise</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> חַסְדּ֑וֹ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>[for] his goodness</n> וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <sup>6381 </sup> <n>and [for] his wonderful works</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to the children</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n>
9: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִ֭שְׂבִּיעַ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>For he satisfieth</n> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>soul</n> שֹׁקֵקָ֑ה <sup>8264 </sup> <n>the longing</n> וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>soul</n> רְ֝עֵבָה <sup>7457 </sup> <n>the hungry</n> מִלֵּא־ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>and filleth</n> טֽוֹב׃ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>with goodness</n>
10: יֹ֭שְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>Such as sit</n> חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>in darkness</n> וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת <sup>6757 </sup> <n>and in the shadow of death</n> אֲסִירֵ֖י <sup>615 </sup> <n>[being] bound</n> עֳנִ֣י <sup>6040 </sup> <n>in affliction</n> וּבַרְזֶֽל׃ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>and iron</n>
11: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> הִמְר֥וּ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>Because they rebelled</n> אִמְרֵי־ <sup>561 </sup> <n>against the words</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>of God</n> וַעֲצַ֖ת <sup>6098 </sup> <n>the counsel</n> עֶלְי֣וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>of the most High</n> נָאָֽצוּ׃ <sup>5006 </sup> <n>and contemned</n>
12: וַיַּכְנַ֣ע <sup>3665 </sup> <n>Therefore he brought down</n> בֶּעָמָ֣ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>with labour</n> לִבָּ֑ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>their heart</n> כָּ֝שְׁל֗וּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>they fell down</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> עֹזֵֽר׃ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>and [there was] none to help</n>
13: וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>Then they cried</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> בַּצַּ֣ר <sup>6862 </sup> <n>in their trouble</n> לָהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>out</n> מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>4691 </sup> <n>them out of their distresses</n> יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>[and] he saved</n>
14: יֽ֭וֹצִיאֵם <sup>3318 </sup> <n>He brought them out</n> מֵחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>of darkness</n> וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת <sup>6757 </sup> <n>and the shadow of death</n> וּמוֹסְר֖וֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>4147 </sup> <n>their bands</n> יְנַתֵּֽק׃ <sup>5423 </sup> <n>in sunder</n>
15: יוֹד֣וּ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>Oh that [men] would praise</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> חַסְדּ֑וֹ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>[for] his goodness</n> וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <sup>6381 </sup> <n>and [for] his wonderful works</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to the children</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n>
16: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שִׁ֭בַּר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>For he hath broken</n> דַּלְת֣וֹת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the gates</n> נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <sup>5178 </sup> <n>of brass</n> וּבְרִיחֵ֖י <sup>1280 </sup> <n>the bars</n> בַרְזֶ֣ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>of iron</n> גִּדֵּֽעַ׃ <sup>1438 </sup> <n>in sunder</n>
17: אֱ֭וִלִים <sup>191 </sup> <n>Fools</n> מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>because</n> פִּשְׁעָ֑ם <sup>6588 </sup> <n>of their transgression</n> וּֽ֝מֵעֲוֹֽנֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>and because of their iniquities</n> יִתְעַנּֽוּ׃ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>are afflicted</n>
18: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֹ֭כֶל <sup>400 </sup> <n>all manner of meat</n> תְּתַעֵ֣ב <sup>8581 </sup> <n>abhorreth</n> נַפְשָׁ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>Their soul</n> וַ֝יַּגִּ֗יעוּ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>and they draw near</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> שַׁ֥עֲרֵי <sup>8179 </sup> <n>unto the gates</n> מָֽוֶת׃ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>of death</n>
19: וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>Then they cry</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> בַּצַּ֣ר <sup>6862 </sup> <n>in their trouble</n> לָהֶ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>out</n> מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>4691 </sup> <n>them out of their distresses</n> יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>[and] he saveth</n>
20: יִשְׁלַ֣ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>He sent</n> דְּ֭בָרוֹ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his word</n> וְיִרְפָּאֵ֑ם <sup>7495 </sup> <n>and healed</n> וִֽ֝ימַלֵּ֗ט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>them and delivered</n> מִשְּׁחִיתוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>7825 </sup> <n>[them] from their destructions</n> ׆

24: הֵ֣מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> רָ֭אוּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>These see</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <sup>4639 </sup> <n>the works</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <sup>6381 </sup> <n>and his wonders</n> בִּמְצוּלָֽה׃ <sup>4688 </sup> <n>in the deep</n> ׆

38: וַיְבָרֲכֵ֣ם <sup>1288 </sup> <n>He blesseth</n> וַיִּרְבּ֣וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>them also so that they are multiplied</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>greatly</n> וּ֝בְהֶמְתָּ֗ם <sup>929 </sup> <n>not their cattle</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יַמְעִֽיט׃ <sup>4591 </sup> <n>to decrease</n>
39: וַיִּמְעֲט֥וּ <sup>4591 </sup> <n>Again they are minished</n> וַיָּשֹׁ֑חוּ <sup>7817 </sup> <n>and brought low</n> מֵעֹ֖צֶר <sup>6115 </sup> <n>through oppression</n> רָעָ֣ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>affliction</n> וְיָגֽוֹן׃ <sup>3015 </sup> <n>and sorrow</n> ׆
40: שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>He poureth</n> בּ֭וּז <sup>937 </sup> <n>contempt</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> נְדִיבִ֑ים <sup>5081 </sup> <n>upon princes</n> וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם <sup>8582 </sup> <n>and causeth them to wander</n> בְּתֹ֣הוּ <sup>8414 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> דָֽרֶךְ׃ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>[where there is] no way</n>
41: וַיְשַׂגֵּ֣ב <sup>7682 </sup> <n>on high</n> אֶבְי֣וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>Yet setteth he the poor</n> מֵע֑וֹנִי <sup>6040 </sup> <n>from affliction</n> וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and maketh</n> כַּ֝צֹּ֗אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>like a flock</n> מִשְׁפָּחֽוֹת׃ <sup>4940 </sup> <n>[him] families</n>
42: יִרְא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> יְשָׁרִ֣ים <sup>3477 </sup> <n>The righteous</n> וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>[it] and rejoice</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <sup>5766 </sup> <n>and all iniquity</n> קָ֣פְצָה <sup>7092 </sup> <n>shall stop</n> פִּֽיהָ׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>her mouth</n>
43: מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> חָכָ֥ם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>Whoso [is] wise</n> וְיִשְׁמָר־ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and will observe</n> אֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>to these</n> וְ֝יִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֗וּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>these [things] even they shall understand</n> חַֽסְדֵ֥י <sup>2617 </sup> <n>the lovingkindness</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
